org.wattdepot.server.http.api

Class WattDepotServerResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.UniformResource
        • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
          • org.wattdepot.server.http.api.WattDepotServerResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminServerResource, CollectorMetaDataServerResource, CollectorMetaDatasServerResource, DepositoriesServerResource, DepositoryMeasurementServerResource, DepositoryMeasurementsServerResource, DepositorySensorsServerResource, DepositoryServerResource, DepositoryValueServerResource, LoginPageServerResource, LoginServerResource, MeasurementTypeServerResource, MeasurementTypesServerResource, SensorGroupServerResource, SensorGroupsServerResource, SensorLocationServerResource, SensorLocationsServerResource, SensorModelServerResource, SensorModelsServerResource, SensorServerResource, SensorsServerResource, UserGroupServerResource, UserGroupsServerResource, UserInfoServerResource, UserPasswordServerResource

    public class WattDepotServerResource
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    WattDepotServerResource - Base class for WattDepot ServerResources. Gets the WattDepot instance from the WattDepotApplication.
    Author:
    Cam Moore
